To charge your Model 3, you can open the charge port door by pressing the bottom of the charge port door when the car is unlocked, using voice commands, or navigating to Controls > Charging > Open Charge Port on the touchscreen. The charging port is located at the rear of the vehicle.

To begin charging, you can use the charging equipment designed specifically for your Model 3, such as a Wall Connector installed in your parking space, or visit a Tesla Supercharger or Destination Charging location. If you encounter any charging issues, you can refer to the troubleshooting alerts provided in the owner's manual for guidance.
